data.name: Servine
data.flavorText: They avoid attacks by sinking into the shadows of thick foliage. They retaliate with masterful whipping techniques.

data.name: Pansage
data.flavorText: This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.

data.name: Dwebble
data.flavorText: The Pokémon can easily melt holes in hard rocks with a liquid secreted from its mouth.

data.name: Pignite
data.flavorText: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

data.name: Dewott
data.flavorText: Scalchop techniques differ from one Dewott to another. It never neglects maintaining its scalchops.

data.name: Emolga
data.flavorText: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membranes and released while it is gliding.

data.name: Woobat
data.flavorText: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.

data.name: Drilbur
data.flavorText: It can dig through the ground at a speed of 30 mph. It could give a car running aboveground a good race.

data.name: Purrloin
data.flavorText: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can't help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.

data.name: Scraggy
data.flavorText: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.

data.name: Klang
data.flavorText: Spinning minigears are rotated at high speed and repeatedly fired away. It is dangerous if the gears don't return.

data.name: Axew
data.flavorText: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
